data.marketing-page-pricing-headline: It Doesn't Get More Expensive as You Grow
data.marketing-page-pricing-notice-payment-sy: All prices are per meeting room per month before tax. If you can't see your country in the list, please contact us and we'll provide a rate.
data.marketing-page-pricing-notice-room-booki: All prices are indicative and subject to applicable taxes in your country and payment method fees. At the moment, we offer services in South Korea only. If you live in another country, please contact us for a price estimate.
data.marketing-page-pricing-questions-descrip: Talk to us. We're available 24/7, even during holidays.
data.marketing-page-pricing-subheadline: You only pay for the booking system. Everything else is on us :)
